title: The Charming Villain Just Wants To Be A Salted Fish - Novel Updates
tags: Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Dragons   Female Protagonist   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Magic   Royalty   Transmigration   Vampires
author: 厌姝
description:
Joyce transmigrated into her middle school sister’s otome manga. It made her a little bit gloomy, but what made her even gloomier was the fact that she was a vampire of the night. Currently, she was kidnapping a beautiful princess and the brave knight wielded his sword in front of her. 

She thought about it, and in order to make up for this mistake, she released the princess and tied up the knight.

Salted fish –  someone who does not want to do anything and has no dreams>
